title: The Firm - Themeforest Simple Company WordPress Theme
description:
This WordPress Template offers everything you need. It's SEO optimized, lightweight, translation ready and comes with a simple admin panel. The file includes a helpfile with videos showing you how to set everything up. The Firm is perfect for companys, law firms and people with small businesses.

To install:
1. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/themes/ directory
2. Activate the theme through the 'Themes' menu in WordPress
